BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer interface of the Web Bluetooth API represents a GATT
Server on a remote device.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerConnect.summary:
NOTE Experimental The
BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.connect() method causes the
script execution environment to connect to this.device.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerDisconnect.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.disconnect() method causes
the script execution environment to disconnect from this.device.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerConnected.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.connected read-only
property returns a boolean value that returns true while this script execution
environment is connected to this.device. It can be false while the user
agent is physically connected.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerGetPrimaryServi.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryService() method
returns a promise to the primary offered by the
Bluetooth device for a specified bluetooth service UUID.
BluetoothRemoteGATTServerGetPrimaryServi.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerGetPrimaryServi.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.getPrimaryServices() method returns a
promise to a list of primary objects offered by the
Bluetooth device for a specified BluetoothServiceUUID.
BluetoothRemoteGATTServerGetPrimaryServi.returns:
A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a list of
objects.

BluetoothRemoteGATTServerDevice.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.device read-only property
returns a reference to the running the server.
